definitions.definition: providing or intended to provide protection

examples.text: The ozone layer forms a protective barrier against the sun's rays.

definitions.definition: having or showing a wish to protect somebody/something

examples.text: He put a protective arm around her shoulders.
She had been fiercely protective towards him as a teenager.
He was extremely protective of his role as advisor.
Lionesses are fiercely protective of their young.
She felt suddenly very protective towards her mother.

definitions.definition: intended to give an advantage to your own country’s industry
